QUICKBATTLEMAP.DropInstructions: Drop background images/videos and optionally JSON files with walls
QUICKBATTLEMAP.DropInstructionsMore: Multiple files can be dropped to create multi-floor scenes (requires Levels module). Files with matching names will be paired automatically.
QUICKBATTLEMAP.MissingFiles: A background image or video is required
QUICKBATTLEMAP.InvalidJSON: The JSON file could not be parsed
QUICKBATTLEMAP.NoGridHint: Skips applying or detecting a grid. Useful for maps without visible grid lines.
QUICKBATTLEMAP.ProgressNote: Shows ongoing tasks like uploading and auto-detecting grid size.
QUICKBATTLEMAP.NoFloorsToMatch: Add floors first before assigning JSON files
QUICKBATTLEMAP.LevelsModuleRequired: Multi-floor scenes require the Levels module by theripper93
